reviews.text: Has been an emotional return to my  secondary school after more than 30 years. Has been tracking all the events happening on FB. The feeling was exceptional meeting all my friends during an old boys gathering.

As a seemingly ordinary neighbourhood school, St Gabriel's is anything but ordinary.

From the highly capable and caring teachers to the supportive school leaders and community, this school is the perfect place for its students to grow and further their aspirations. The teachers in this school are definitely what defines the experience Gabrielites receive. With teachers who motivate students to continuously challenge themselves to scale to greater heights and also have a soft spot to render support and a listening ear to students, St. Gabriel's feels like a second home for its students.

With numerous opportunities for students to grow in fields such as leadership, aviation and their CCA, students are strongly encouraged to ignite the fire in them to make their dreams a reality.

The homely feel of the campus is also something that students can look forward to with tons of open space and greenery that allows students to refresh and take in the peaceful surroundings.

Personally, St. Gabriel's has truly shaped me into who I am today, thanks to its remarkable community and supportive staff. I would definitely relive the experience in a heartbeat!

The school environment is welcoming and appreciative of the actions of students.

Facilities are well maintained with renovations for certain facilities like the library and AVA room being greatly appreciated.

Teachers and school body are great, putting their all for the betterment of the students.

St gabs is st Great!

Thank you everyone from st gabs.

Labor Omnia Vincit!

This review is coming from a gabrielite himself. Overall this school is amazing with well-kept facilities, friendly and passionate teacher and rather chill discipline team. It's not what it looks like in the past, where many described St. Gabriel's as a 'gangster school', but once you enter its the exact opposite. Friendly students that'll help you in school. It's only been a few weeks as I'm a Sec 1 but solid school

That school is so good and they are a good school they teach me positive things and teachers are good and my gabrielite friend we talk and we play soccer  . St Gabriel's is better than chaoyang school #school#gabrilite
